Nature’s Care

logo design / branding / stationery

Client
Nature’s Care Health Products
Deliverables
Logo Design, Branding, Stationery

Nature’s Care is a local health product shop in downtown Ottawa. The store is recognized for its extensive inventory, friendly staff and knowledgeable owner, so the redesign of their logo and brand had these qualities in mind.

thank you for stopping by!
